name: Closed Encounter
description:
Some nights, you are dreaming of this strange complex. You don't feel somehow comfortable in here as this place feels empty and silent.

What is this place? Why are you here? Did other people have been trapped here?

If you want to wake up, you'll know that you have to find it before IT finds you.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Shift: Run
E: Interact
Esc: Quit game
